channel.title: OMG please need port foward and source help
channel.description: do you actually need to port forward doing the static ip address thing or can you just ignore it? also how do you use a source for your server? please help :)

item.description:

bob you dont need an update for me its easier i use a program of steam you could try download hlds and when you load it up look at the top for an ip 192.x.x.x itll be your static ip it saves time and questions it automatically does this through the program.
